title: Encryption mechanismBase Station System
extract: Encryption. Encryption is the process of converting data to an unrecognizable or "encrypted" form. It is commonly used to protect sensitive information so that only authorized parties can view it. ... Encryption is also used to secure data sent over wireless networks and the Internet.Nov 11, 2014
extract_html: Encryption. Encryption is the process of converting data to an unrecognizable or "encrypted" form. It is commonly used to protect sensitive information so that only authorized parties can view it. ... Encryption is also used to secure data sent over wireless networks and the Internet.Nov 11, 2014
